title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
